featured.text: His father, __(19)__ always hoped that he would get a PhD and become a professor, __(20)__ with a scoff: “What is all this nonsense?!”

definition.zh_def: 輕蔑地嘲笑或不屑一顧。
definition.en_def: To speak to someone or about something in a scornfully derisive or mocking way.
definition.example: She scoffed at the idea of going out in the rain.
